availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Organized at Fort Snelling, Minnesota. Mustered in on June 26, 1861, and mustered out on July 11, 1865. Commander(s): Colonel Horatio Phillips Van Cleve.

ab.bibl:
A Compendium of the War of the Rebellion, vol. 1 (Des Moines: The Dyer Publishing Company, 1908), 1296-97.
Matthew W. Hutchinson, "Second Minnesota Volunteer Infantry Regiment," Minnesota Historical Society, https://www.mnopedia.org/group/second-minnesota-volunteer-infantry-regiment/ (accessed on January 5, 2021).
